description: Count deaths or trophies and display them on your livestream
alert_total_trophies: You must define the total trophies to be earned first
alert_all_trophies: You already have conquisted all trophies
invalid_widget_type: Invalid widget for this input. Check if it really belongs to this widget.

modal.intro: With StatsCounter, you can create and display custom counters for deaths and trophies directly on your livestream.
modal.step_generate: After setting up a counter, click on "Generate widget URL" to create a unique link.
modal.step_use_obs: This link can be used in OBS as a browser source to show the counter live during your stream.
modal.step_storage: Saved widgets are stored locally in your browser so you can come back and pick up where you left off.
modal.new_theme: New theme added: "Basic - remove borders" for those who prefer just the text.
